mapper.select: SELECT md.product_code AS product_code, pi.product_name AS product_name, md.product_color AS product_color, md.order_qy AS req_qy, (md.order_qy - COALESCE(dd.delivery_qy, 0)) AS rest_qy, --잔여량 구하기 md.amount AS price, -- 제품 단가 금액 합계 md.product_color AS product_color, md.unit_price AS unit_price FROM material_order_details md JOIN product_info pi ON (md.product_code = pi.product_code) LEFT JOIN delivery_details dd ON (md.mtril_order_code = dd.order_code) AND (md.product_color = dd.product_color) WHERE md.mtril_order_code = #{orderCode} ORDER BY md.product_code
SELECT address_main || ' ' || al.address_info AS address FROM company cy JOIN address_list al ON (cy.address_seq = al.address_seq) WHERE company_code = #{companyCode}

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH('DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(delivery_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0)) = 9 THEN null ELSE 'DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(delivery_code), 10)) + 1), 4, 0) END FROM delivery WHERE TO_CHAR(rgsde, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)), ('DEV' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0001')) AS delivery_code FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery(delivery_code, company_se, mtril_order_code, company_code, company_name, order_date, dedt, storage_name, dedt_address ,delivery_status , remark, charger_code, charger_name, rgsde, updde, time, amount, delivery_company_code) VALUES (#{info.deliveryCode}, #{info.companySe}, #{info.productOrderCode}, #{info.companyCode}, #{info.companyName}, #{info.orderDate}, #{info.dedt}, #{info.storageName}, #{info.dedtAddress} , #{info.deliveryStatus}, #{info.remark}, #{info.chargerCode}, #{info.chargerName}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{info.time}, #{info.amount}, #{info.divyCompanyCode})

INSERT INTO delivery_details(delivery_product_no, delivery_code, product_code, product_size, product_color, product_lot , request_qy, delivery_qy, product_se, order_code, unit_price, price) VALUES (delivery_details_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pinfo.deliveryCode}, #{pinfo.productCode}, #{pinfo.productSize}, #{pinfo.productColor}, ' ', #{pinfo.reqQy}, #{pinfo.deliveryQy}, 'PT01', #{pinfo.productOrderCode}, #{pinfo.unitPrice}, #{pinfo.price})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(de PK_DELIVERY)*/ ROWNUM AS rn, de.delivery_code AS delivery_code, de.mtril_order_code AS mtril_order_code, de.order_date AS order_date, de.dedt AS dedt, product_summary('delivery_details', delivery_code) AS summary, de.time AS time, get_comm(delivery_status) AS comm_status, TO_CHAR(de.rgsde, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS regist_date, mo.charger_code AS order_charger_code, mo.charger_name AS order_charger, de.dedt_address AS dedt_address, de.remark AS remark FROM delivery de JOIN material_order mo ON (de.mtril_order_code = mo.mtril_order_code) WHERE de.delivery_company_code = #{cri.targetCompany}
AND de.delivery_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.deliveryCode}) || '%' --주문코드
AND de.mtril_order_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.orderCode}) || '%' --주문코드
AND de.delivery_code IN (SELECT dd.delivery_code FROM delivery_details dd JOIN product_info pi ON (dd.product_code = pi.product_code) WHERE pi.product_name LIKE '%' || #{cri.productName} || '%') --제품명
AND de.delivery_code IN (SELECT delivery_code FROM delivery_details WHERE UPPER(product_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.productCode}) || '%') --제품코드
AND de.company_name LIKE '%' || #{cri.companyName} || '%' --업체명
AND de.company_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.companyCode}) || '%' --업체코드
AND mo.charger_code LIKE '%' || #{cri.orderChargerCode} || '%' --주문 담당자
AND mo.charger_name LIKE '%' || #{cri.orderCharger} || '%' --주문 담당자
AND de.order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{cri.orderDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{cri.orderDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --주문일
AND de.dedt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --납기일
AND delivery_status = #{cri.deliveryStatus}
AND delivery_status IN ('DS01', 'DS05')
ORDER BY de.delivery_code DESC ) info WHERE info.rn <= #{cri.end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{cri.start}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery de JOIN material_order mo ON (de.mtril_order_code = mo.mtril_order_code) WHERE de.delivery_company_code = #{cri.targetCompany}
AND de.delivery_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.deliveryCode}) || '%' --주문코드

AND de.delivery_code IN (SELECT delivery_code FROM delivery_details WHERE UPPER(product_code) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.productCode}) || '%') --제품코드

AND de.company_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{cri.companyCode}) || '%' --업체코드
AND mo.charger_code LIKE '%' || #{cri.orderChargerCode} || '%' --주문 담당자
AND mo.charger_name LIKE '%' || #{cri.orderCharger} || '%' --주문 담당자

AND de.dedt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{cri.dedtEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') --납기일
